title: SPD-Technology: Middle Kotlin Developer (Full-time)
description: Participated in developing a cloud-based platform for managing global IoT networks and mobile telecommunication systems, integrating with worldwide mobile operators. The system is built on a microservices architecture, ensuring high performance, flexibility, scalability, and reliability. Key functionalities include customer management, SIM management, billing operations, traffic routing, data analytics, and automation of IoT-device interactions.

listDescription: Microservices Development: Built scalable, fault-tolerant microservices in Kotlin with Spring Boot and related frameworks (WebFlux, Spring Data, Security), handling billing, invoicing, and reporting. JasperSoft Studio Integration: Implemented dynamic invoice generation and reporting services integrated with JasperSoft Studio
Reactive Programming: Developed asynchronous, non-blocking microservices using Spring WebFlux, significantly enhancing system performance.
REST API Development: Designed and developed REST APIs, closely collaborating with frontend teams for seamless integration.
Messaging with Apache Kafka: Integrated microservices using Kafka, ensuring reliable, scalable communication within an event-driven architecture.
Testing & QA: Created unit and integration tests, ensuring high-quality and reliable code.
CI/CD Automation: Automated build and deployment processes using Docker, Gradle, and Jenkins, optimizing CI/CD pipelines.
Kubernetes & Helm: Gained practical experience deploying microservices on Kubernetes, including creating and managing Helm Charts.

title: Internship SPD-Technology: Junior Java Developer
description: An internal IoT security platform at SPD Technology, designed to provide real-time insights from IoT devices and enable data visualization for end-users. The solution leveraged modern technologies and followed Agile methodologies, ensuring scalability, reliability, and seamless integration between backend services and the UI.

listDescription: Backend Development:  Contributed to backend architecture and functionality development using Java and Spring Boot, within a 6-member Agile team.

Cross-team Collaboration:  Closely coordinated with QA engineers to ensure software quality through rigorous testing and collaborated with frontend developers to achieve seamless integration between backend services and UI components.
Testing & Quality Assurance:  Developed unit and integration tests to validate functionality, reliability, and overall quality of the solution.
Agile Methodology:  Worked actively using SCRUM methodologies, including sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and iterative improvements.
